title: varadha varam tha
sahitya:
varadhaa varam thaa vana maaliee
hariyE aruLvaai chakradhaaree   
[varadhaa]


anupallavi

iraivaa ezhilE Ezhisaip payanE
maRavEn nin kazhalE pazham perum maRaiyOnE
[varadhaa]

caraNam

kuRaivaRRa vaazhvu thanthaalum nee enakku
niRaivaRRu thaazhvudan varuginREn 
maRaigaLum kaaNaa maadhavanE maayaa
thirai vilakki - agnaana thirai vilakki
arul purivaai thiruviNNagaraanE   
[varadhaa]
